description: Cyvex Nutrition developed a line of Standardized Broccoli Sprout Powders in light of recent research revealing the antioxidant propefties of broccoli sprouts. Glucosinolates are natural sulfur-containing compounds found in cruciferous (cabbage family) vegetables. Upon cooking/crushing, glucosinolates release isothiocyanates, powerful antioxidants such as sulforaphane, potent stimulators of detoxifying phase ll enzymes in the human body.Key HighlightsDetoxificationGastrointestinal SupportAbsorption and Utilization of Glucosinolates
